## Source: ossf-package-analysis (293674a169b88ab6b0c1b4d4921389493a0975e3bdbc772159581102a11f2d96)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'connectnodewebclient' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
